original_text: Five days after that, Ananias, the leader of the priests, went to Caesarea. Some important Jews went with him. A man called Tertullus also went with them. He was a lawyer. All these people went to meet with Felix, the ruler. They told Felix what Paul had done. Felix would judge who was right.
korean_text: 닷새 후에 대제사장 아나니아가 어떤 장로들과 한 변호사 더둘로와 함께 내려와서 총독 앞에서 바울을 고발하니라

sentences.original_text: Ananias, the leader of the priests
Some important Jews went with him
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 중요한 유대인들이 그와 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: A man called Tertullus also went with them
All these people went to meet with Felix
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들은 펠릭스를 만나러 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: They told Felix what Paul had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 펠릭스에게 바울이 한 일을 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: Felix would judge who was right
